ygData.subject: Re: BlackFortress
ygData.msgSnippet: With hardly a movement of his upper body, Night Shift gives no visual indication of attempting to free his wrists of his shackles.  Not even the sound of metal

With hardly a movement of his upper body, Night Shift gives no visual indic=
ation of attempting to free his wrists of his shackles.  Not even the sound=
 of metal clinking against the wall of the room.  

" It's all cool in here=
, it ain't like I'm gonna bomb the joint."
